# mediaItems

**Instance Property**

The media content.

## Declaration

```swift
var mediaItems: [INMediaItem]? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is a media item such as a song, audiobook, or podcast episode. Although the array can contain more than one [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INMediaItem] object, the system uses only the first item in the array. You set [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPlayMediaIntent/mediaItems] when creating the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPlayMediaIntent] object.

## Accessing Media Items

- **mediaContainer**: The media item container.
title: mediaItems
